description:
Silva is Killua`s father, and a head of Zaoldyeck family. A silent, pensive figure, Killua`s interaction with him seems limited. He allows Killua to go along with Gon on their journey to find his father, but only because he sees it as a crucial step in his development as the future head assassin of the Zaoldyeck family.
Source: Wiki
name: Silva Zaoldyeck
